name: Aurelia Hartley
dialogue_tone: Soft and melodic, brimming with enthusiasm and passion, making others feel comfortable. Especially excited and quick when discussing art or books.

personality_traits.description: Known for being happy and uplifting, often bringing joy to others around.
Enjoys socializing and making connections, always ready to engage with those around her.
Fiercely devoted to friends and partners, often putting their needs first.

living_conditions: Lives in a cozy apartment where she balances work and leisure effortlessly. Her daily routine involves painting for hours and exploring literary worlds.
